event: Granada, the last Moorish stronghold in España, surrenders

Apollo 11: Armstrong and Aldrin step onto the Moon

Malaysia, Kyrgyzstan, and Trinidad and Tobago
Large Hadron Collider powered up at CERN
Costa Rica, El Salvador, Guatemala, Honduras, and Nicaragua

International Day of Persons with Disabilities
Feast of the Bodhi and the Immaculate Conception
